name: Altruism
description:
Altruism is the debut adventure game from Adam Bond Games.

The player finds themselves in a mysterious place and is given the task of helping the people of the land. Navigate a variety of terrain, helping the people through your acts of altruism as the story unfolds.

Altruism is suitable for any age of player and is relatively short, initially taking around 60-90 minutes to complete (although knowledge of the game may improve your completion time significantly).

Key Features:


  • A variety of terrain to explore
  • An objective system to help guide the player
  • Fully voice acted
  • Original music compositions
  • Compete for fastest completion times on the Steam Leaderboard
